point-of-interest.name: Kotoch Entrance
point-of-interest.description: Kotoch is a Dungeon which lies in an area of the Orril Mountains. There are lots of routes which you can choose but be careful and keep your eyes open for danger. (Player Level 20 - 65)

point-of-interest.name: Orril Dwarf Mine North Entrance
point-of-interest.title: Orril Dwarf Mine
point-of-interest.description: The tunnelsystem of Orril Dwarf Mine is guarded by lots of dwarves and their pet, a green dragon. But it also contains one of the most precious materials of whole Faiumoni, iron ore. (Player Level 30 - 65)

point-of-interest.name: Orril Dwarf Mine South Entrance
point-of-interest.title: Orril Dwarf Mine
point-of-interest.description: The tunnelsystem of Orril Dwarf Mine is guarded by lots of dwarves and their pet, a green dragon. But it also contains one of the most precious materials of whole Faiumoni, iron ore. (Player Level 30 - 65)

point-of-interest.name: Orril Castle
point-of-interest.description: Huge Orril Castle is located in the Orril Mountain area. It includes different floors and creatures which young adventurers have to pass before they find a secret place waiting underneath the castle... (Player Level 40 - 150)

point-of-interest.name: Orril Dungeon
point-of-interest.description: The Orril Dungeon is also known as the "Rat Dungeon". Maybe you will find your way to something special down in the tunnels... (Player Level 5 - 70)

entity.attribute: North: Or'ril castle West: Fado East: Nalwor Northeast: Semos

implementation.parameter: You must learn to use orb first.
You must learn to use orb first.

entity.attribute: The hidden secrets of Athor island -By Sara Beth- Down in the deep sea around Athor island it lays, hidden under soft sand - the mighty treasure of Faiumoni.
Success in fights: a manual -By Hayunn Naratha- As a mighty warrior, you always need to wear a powerful armor in fights.
Wooooza! Magic and its powerful potions -By Salva Mattori- You don't believe in magic? The potion of love, made from a magician's hand, even works for Yetis.

Adventurers and their tricks: Supplies and breaks are always needed! -By Thanatos- Hungry? Thirsty? Tired? A break might help. Take a look around the lovely nature of Faiumoni and find relaxing places to make a stop at. Even when you are busy during tasks, a healthy snack will power you up.

Paradies love - or drama? -By Tamara- And there they were: two strangers, alone in the tunnel of Amazon island, heading out for reaching the right entrance to a life full of joy and peace - at least they hoped for that.

Diaries of a warrior -By Lieutenant Drilenun- Oh my oh my oh my! What for a huge creature I'm looking at! It's red, it's huge it's powerful, it has a hard forehand...Could that be it? It is a balrog!"

Baking for starters -By Gaston- You need some flour, some eggs, some butter, some sugar, some chocolate and some milk, a hot drink for the winter, some rat to make it silk. Now after waiting for some time and after the job is done: a crepes suzette that is you hold, enjoy it and have fun!

implementation.parameter: You do not know how to use the orb.
The tombstone needs a gem to unlock it.

portal.attribute: Only a certain gem can unlock the secrets of the headstone.

implementation.parameter: You do not have the key to open the lock.
